summary: A man awakens in the bedroom of a one-night stand and discovers that he must remain in her building indefinitely, as the authorities deal with last night's UFO invasion. What's more, her weirdo neighbor has a huge unrequited crush on her.
cast: Julián Villagrán|Michelle Jenner|Carlos Areces|Raúl Cimas|Miguel Noguera
keywords: low budget sci fi movie|unidentified flying object|alien invasion|alien|one word title
title: Extraterrestre
